Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both parties and I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth and the quality it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $750,000. I trust this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of a successful transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
